name: Valving Machine for LPG Gas Cylinders
description:
for automation of the bottle maintenance process,
Complete with Ex-proof motor 2,0 kW, 400 V, 50 Hz,
Screwing speed approx. 35 rpm,
Control switch in ex-proof design
ADDITIONAL PUSH BUTTON AND 2ND LIMIT SWITCH (Eex de IIC T6)
Incl. SUPPORT FOR A FREE STANDING VALVING MACHINE
With the following functions:
"START", "STOP", change of rotation direction, "emergency stop"
with pneumatic clamping device for cylinder
diameter 180-400, working pressure 6-8 bar,
Max. torque:
- to insert a valve 600 Nm
- to remove a valve 1000 Nm,
Equipped with slide door with safety lock
- for bottles smaller as 630mm it needs a platform
(not inclusiv, optional),
- Performance: approx. 90* bottle per hour (*depends on operator)
Ex-proof marking: Ex II 2G EEx II T3
Design: for floor installation
